location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to the Accountant, Military Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, encloses a receipt (not included) for 300 Spanish dollars, or 687 rupees, which has been advanced to Lieutenant William MacDonald, Commander of the HC dow [dhow] Nimrod,which has been employed for the use of the garrison at Rassulkhyma [Ra's al-Khaymah].
